page.title: 14Housing in Swanley cont.
page.content: After World War 2 the population rose very quickly reaching 20,945 in 1981. 38.9% of the houses in Swanley belong to Sevenoaks District Council.56.8% are owner-occupied and the remaining 4.3% are owned by private landlords or are tied cottages. Swanley has not been used to house London overspill nonetheless all the space allocated on the town plan of 1967 for housing has now been filled. Decisions will now have to be made about the future growth of Swanley how much and in which direction.
